name: Ludo Battle - Don't Dice!
description:
Ludo Battle - Don't Dice!

In this game you will collect Ludo figures to defeat dangerous foes! Each figure has their own dice withe their own ability. This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 and the theme was "Roll of th Dice". 

Huge thanks to Noodle for making all the art for the game and Smartulu for making all music and sound effects, I think it turned out amazing!

Credits:

Progrmmed by Pk Moritz using Unity (Pk Moritz#7830)
Art made by Noodle (Noodle#8456)
Music and Sound by Smartulu (Smartulu#7532)
